Prompt engineering is a specialized discipline within artificial intelligence (AI) that focuses on optimizing the 
interaction between human inputs and AI models, particularly language models. The primary objective is to 
design and refine prompts —specific inputs that guide the AI —to achieve accurate, relevant, and contextually 
appropriate outputs.
